enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve resolving an option by its name, which is a prerequisite for getOptionObject to function correctly.
getOptionObject internally calls getParsedOptionValue to retrieve the parsed option value, indicating a strong dependency.
Both methods return a value related to an option, which can inform the construction of assertions for getOptionObject.
Both methods handle exceptions related to option parsing, which can inform the construction of assertions for exception scenarios in getOptionObject.
